university.description: I focused on probability theory, data analysis, and regression modeling. I work with statistical tools like R, SPSS, and Python to produce data-driven insights.

AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.bio: I am a statistics undergraduate with a strong interest in data science, software development, and statistical modeling. I specialize in transforming data into actionable insights using tools like Python, R, and SPSS.
AboutMe.bio2: My technical focus extends to full-stack development, where I utilize technologies such as React, Next.js, Go, and PostgreSQL to build scalable, efficient, and user-centric web applications.

descriptions.pickin: A minimalist and fast lottery system. It offers real-time updates, a secure participation structure, and a modern interface.
descriptions.doraai: For lives that start tomorrows in health.
descriptions.ticaretIstatistik: This project highlights the Istanbul Commerce University Statistics Program, offering a concise overview of its structure, scope, and opportunities for students and stakeholders.
descriptions.codeShare: A platform where you can share your code and earn money.

detailDescriptions.wsuppDetail: Wsupp.co is a WhatsApp marketing automation platform built with Bun, Hono, and Svelte. It enables businesses to manage bulk messaging campaigns, track delivery analytics, and automate customer engagement workflows through a fast, modern interface styled with Tailwind CSS.
detailDescriptions.pickinDetail: Pickin.co is a minimalist and high-performance lottery system powered by Redis and PostgreSQL on the backend with a Next.js frontend. It provides real-time draw updates, a secure and transparent participation structure, and a sleek modern interface designed for speed and reliability.
detailDescriptions.doraaiDetail: DORA AI (DoÄŸumda Risk Analizi) is an AI-powered birth risk analysis system built with Python and FastAPI on the backend and Next.js on the frontend. It uses machine learning models to predict and assess health risks during childbirth, helping medical professionals make data-driven decisions for safer deliveries.
detailDescriptions.ticaretIstatistikDetail: Ticaret Ä°statistik is a web project showcasing the Istanbul Commerce University Statistics Program. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, it presents the program's curriculum, faculty, research areas, and career opportunities in a clean, accessible format for prospective students and stakeholders.
detailDescriptions.codeShareDetail: Code Share is a web platform built with React.js and Tailwind CSS where developers can share their code snippets publicly. It provides a simple, intuitive interface for publishing, discovering, and organizing code examples across various programming languages.

milestones.codeshareMilestone2: Public release with code sharing features
